Translations.Text: M
revelation this scripture est DI Almighty Sagx
heavens ter est plen de proofs believers
Ankaux en your creation creation all best tie est proofs popol est nepr
Ankaux alternation de nokt tag provisions ti DI send down cxiel revive dead land manipulation vent; all these est proofs popol kompren
These est di revelations ni recite vi truthfully. En which Hadith DI His revelations ili kred
Ve al cxiu fabricator kulp
auxd di revelations recited him tiam insist arrogantly sur his voj as li neniam auxd them! Promes him painful retribution
When li lern anything our revelations li mok them. These incurred shameful retribution
Awaiting them est Gehenna. Their earnings ne help them nor idols ili set DI. Ili incurred terrible retribution
This est beacon those disbelieve these revelations their Lord incurred condemnation painful retribution
DI est UNU committed mar your service tial ke SXIP roam GXI en accordance kun His LEGX. Vi tiel streb His provisions ti vi est appreciative
Li committed en your service cxio heavens ter; all el Him! These est proofs popol reflect
Tell those kred forgive those ne expect tag DI! Li fully pag everyone whatever ili earned
Whoever works righteousness does por his own bon whoever works evil does tial his own detriment! Al your Lord vi returned
Ni don Infan de Israel scripture wisdom prophethood proviz them bon provisions ni bestowed them plur blessings than any ali popol
Ni don them herein klar commandments. Ironically ili ne disput this knowledge ven them. This est jealousy their part. Surely your Lord jugx them Tag Resurrection cxio ili disput
Ni tiam appointed vi establ gxust legx; vi sekv this ne sekv wishes de those ne kon
Ili ne help vi je all DI. est transgressors ally 1 another while DI est Lord de des righteous
This proviz enlightenments popol guidance mercy those est nepr
those work evil expect ni trakt them sam manier as those kred plumb righteous life? Can their life their death est des sam Wrong ja est their judgment
DI KRE heavens TER SPECIF purpose en ord pag each ANIM whatever gxi earned MALPLEJ injustice
Vi not unu di hav est his ego? Consequently DI send him astray his knowledge sigel his auxd his mens met vual his okul! Who tiam direkt him such decision DI? Vi ne pren heed
Ili dir Ni nur viv this life; ni viv mort nur temp kauxz our death! Ili ne hav sure knowledge this; ili nur konjekt
When our revelations recited them clearly their nur argument est dir Bring dors our forefathers vi est truthful
Dir DI granted vi life tiam Li puts vi death tiam Li summon vi Tag Resurrection est inevitable! Plej popol ne kon
Al DI aparten all sovereignty de heavens ter! Tag Hor Judgment ven pas ke est when falsifiers perd
Vi seg cxiu community kneeling Cxiu community est vok view their record Hodiaux vi get pag por cxio vi done
This est our record gxi utters truth vi! Ni recording cxio vi did
As por those kred work righteousness their Lord admit them His mercy! This est great triumf
As por those disbelieve My revelations Est recited vi vi torn arrogant est wicked popol
When gxi proklam di promes est truth ke Hor Judgment inevitable vi dir Ni ne kon ki Hor est Ni est plen de konjekt gxi; ni ne est nepr
evils their works igx evident al them tre ajx ili mok ven haunt them
Gxi proklam Hodiaux ni forges vi just as vi forges meeting this tag. Your abode est hellfire vi ne hav helpers
This est vi sorb di revelations en vain preoccupied 1 life. Consequently ili neniam exit therefrom nor vol ili pretekst
Al DI aparten all lauxd; Lord heavens Lord ter Lord univers
Al Him aparten all supremacy heavens ter! Li est Almighty Sagx
